### writeGeneratedObject() {#gacacf298ae33051bd387434c4ebdd2be7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::string ThinLTOCodeGenerator::writeGeneratedObject (int count, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> CacheEntryPath, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorybuffer">MemoryBuffer</a> &amp; OutputBuffer)</>}>
Write temporary object file to SavedObjectDirectoryPath, write symlink to Cache directory if needed.

Write out the generated object file, either from CacheEntryPath or from <a href="/docs/api/classes/outputbuffer">OutputBuffer</a>, preferring hard-link when possible.

Returns the path to the generated file in SavedObjectsDirectoryPath.
